title: Sampler, early 20th century
description: Small square of knitting in white cotton with knitted lace edging on all four sides. Squares are cut from field in the manner of a darning sampler, and filled. Unfinished. The square which has been removed is attached with a pin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: knitted darning. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-462.
